gradients.gold_text: bg-clip-text text-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-[#D4AF37] via-[#F3E5AB] to-[#B8860B]

grid.products: grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6 md:gap-8

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all duration-300 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-primary border border-primary hover:bg-primary/5 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all duration-300
buttons.outline: bg-transparent border border-white text-white hover:bg-white hover:text-black rounded-full px-8 py-3 transition-all duration-300

cards.product: group relative bg-white overflow-hidden transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-lg border border-transparent hover:border-primary/10
cards.feature: bg-background-alt p-8 text-center hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

inputs.default: rounded-md border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-2 text-sm shadow-sm placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-primary

instructions_to_main_agent: Use the provided logo URL in the header and footer.
Implement the 'Playfair Display' font for all headings to ensure the premium look.
Use the 'Manrope' font for body text for readability.
Ensure the primary pink color (#BE185D) is used for primary actions (Add to Cart, Checkout).
Use the Gold gradient for special accents like 'Sale' badges or 'New Arrival' tags.
The layout must be mobile-first. Ensure touch targets are large enough (min 44px).
Use Shadcn components for complex interactions (Dialogs, Sheets, Dropdowns) but style them to match the theme.
Do NOT use dark mode. Force light mode in tailwind config if necessary.
For the Product Detail Page, use a clean layout with the image gallery on the left (or top on mobile) and details on the right.
Implement a 'WhatsApp' floating button using the brand color #25D366 or the brand gold.
Ensure all images have lazy loading enabled.
Use the 'sonner' library for toast notifications as per the system rules.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. Use generous spacing (p-8, p-12) to create breathing room.
Do not use gradients for dark colors. Use solid dark colors for text.
Add micro-interactions to all buttons and links (hover states, active states).
Ensure contrast ratios meet WCAG AA standards, especially for pink text on white backgrounds.
Do not center-align long text blocks. Left-align for readability.
